subject: Football
Free Agents (Sports)
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Though the Jets remained involved, intent and hopeful, the elite free-agent cornerback Nnamdi Asomugha joined the Philadelphia Eagles, signing a five-year, $60 million contract.
snippet: Though the Jets remained involved, intent and hopeful, the elite free-agent cornerback Nnamdi Asomugha joined the Philadelphia Eagles, signing a five-year, $60 million contract.
